meanings: a scion of an illustrious family
hand sth down to descendants as a family treasure

vlive.korean: [팁으로 몇 번 터치 후 손으로 립라인을 만들어주자] 굉장히 자연스럽게 발라드릴게요. [Dab a few times with the tip and draw a lip line with your fingers] It glides on very naturally. 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : 클럽가다가 50만원짜리 디올 립세트 받음.. [미친 딜리버리 시즌2] EP02 불금 메이크업
vlive.english: [Dab a few times with the tip and draw a lip line with your fingers] It glides on very naturally.

vlive.korean: 후손들에게 많이 많이 알려주세요 이리 오너라~ so let your descendants know. Come over here~ 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [6-2] 추억의 일기장 속, 단원들이 찾은 대본 힌트는?
vlive.english: so let your descendants know. Come over here~

vlive.korean: 그런 뜻이 아니라 빨리 나의 후손을... I didn't mean it. I just want to have my descendants... 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [REPLAY] MONSTA X-RAY (몬스타엑스레이) _ 5화
vlive.english: I didn't mean it. I just want to have my descendants...

vlive.korean: 이거 너무 좀 후손으로서... 꼭 이분을 영화로 꺼내야 되겠다. As a descendant, I thought I should make a movie about him. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <고산자, 대동여지도> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: As a descendant, I thought I should make a movie about him.

vlive.korean: [이렇게 후손 바라기(?)인 민혁은] 잠깐. 이상한 거 아니잖아. [Minhyuk who wants to have descendants] Hang on. It's not strange. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [REPLAY] MONSTA X-RAY (몬스타엑스레이) _ 5화
vlive.english: [Minhyuk who wants to have descendants] Hang on. It's not strange.

examples.korean: Many of them are descendants of the original settlers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들 중 많은 이들이 원 정착자들의 후손이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many of them are descendants of the original settlers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a direct descendant of the country’s first president 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 나라 초대 대통령의 직계 후손 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a direct descendant of the country’s first president Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He claims to be descended from a Spanish prince. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 스페인 왕자의 후손이라고 주장한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He claims to be descended from a Spanish prince. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Every culture hands down epigrams for its descendants. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 문화는 후손에게 경구를 전한다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Every culture hands down epigrams for its descendants. Add to Wordbook
